column4: hey all...Im running 8.10 and yes I know it's not supported but I just want to upgrade my java installation...I can't upgrade any software at all b/c I keep getting this prompt to d/l  jdk-6u10-docs.zip or jdk-6u10-docs-ja.zip but these arent even available anymore!
You will have to do it manually.
Do you know how old 8.10 is?
